title: Once Upon a Time Vikram Song Lyrics
stanzas:
once upon a time
there lived a ghost
he is known to be the killer
and feared the most.

the eagle is coming
you better start running
his blood is rushing
stunning and gunning

the eagle is coming
you better start running
his blood is rushing
stunning and gunning

once upon a time
there lived a ghost
he is known to be the killer
and feared the most.
